description: New Russian laws impose tough penalties for violating lockdown rules.
title: Coronavirus: Russia includes jail terms to enforce crackdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Russia includes jail terms to enforce crackdown - BBC News
maintext: However, it emerged on Tuesday that the head of the main Moscow hospital treating patients with Covid-19 has tested positive. Denis Protsenko gave Mr Putin a tour of the Kommunarka hospital a week ago, but the president's spokesman says there is no need to worry as he tested regularly.
